Name: Syringe
Description: A common syringe. Can be concealed and used as an attack on restrained, paralyzed or unconscious enemies.

Name: Syringe Dart
Description: A small syringe with feather fins. Must be fired from a blowgun.

Name: Insulated Container
Description: Used to stow tipped ammunition like darts or bullets.

Name: Insulated Scabbard
Description: Used to stow one-handed bladed weapons to prevent coated poison from expiring. Can be flooded with paste to keep the blade coated.

Name: Wrist Pouch
Description: Used to contain powder or paste in oneâ€™s wrist. Can be applied to another object via a sleight of hand check.

Name: Cultivation Cart
Description: Used to grow plants, animals, and parasites for harvesting poisons.

Name: Gasifier
Description: Quickly evaporates any gas fed into it and blows it through a nozzle in a 15ft cone. Worn as a backpack (15 lbs). Loading takes 1 minute. Holds up to 100 doses of a single poison.

Name: Gas Grenade
Description: Small, single-dose grenade. Can be thrown as an action. Counts as a grenade for properties and masteries. the DC of the poison replaces the grenade DC.

Name: Smoker
Description: Quickly ignites smoke poisons and blows it through a nozzle in a 15ft cone. Worn as a backpack (15 lbs). Loading takes 1 minute. Holds up to 100 doses of a single poison.

Name: Clockwork Smoke Grenade
Description: Small, single-dose grenade. Can be thrown as an object action and set to release its dose in up to 1 minute.

Name: Insulated Gloves
Description: Insulated gloves immune to most poison types. Useful for creating and delivering poisons via touch.

Name: Poisoner Masquerade
Description: Provides protection against gases and smokes that affect by being breathed in. Useful for creating and delivering poisons.
